title: Account permanently suspended
body:
Tried to log onto my main after a long break, only to find my account details had been changed I lodged a ticket to Riot. What I received back was a mere notice that I had been permanently banned for being compromised too many times and that I was a threat to the community(?). This is truly disappointing to hear after playing with this account for over 3-4 years, accumulating a large sum of money in an account only to be taken away for being hacked.

[Riot's response](https://m.imgur.com/a/XcBGy)

replies.body: Pose a risk for other players? Someone want to explain how?

Basically in case the person using the compromised account starts trolling/scripting or super flaming. 

On top of this, the compromise could pose as the original player and catfish people on the friends list for personal information.

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=wvEbuPZj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-11T03:47:34.553+0000)
>
> Pose a risk for other players? Someone want to explain how?

This is the part as to which I am most confused about.

Hi Shibal seki,

Are you able to provide a ticket number? I will look into it and provide some more context.

I took an extensive look into your ticket and account history. From what I can see, I can only conclude that your account details have been shared on more than one occasion, and these details were even passed on to others outside of your own circle of friends, resulting in you losing access and having to request for it to be recovered multiple times.

For a good explanation as to why we cannot continue to recover accounts that just keep being shared and compromised, please see Yaiamone's post below.
